Black.$description: Use as Black where black colour is needed. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Darkest.$description: Darkest grey colour. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Darker.$description: Darker grey. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Dark.$description: Dark grey. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Light.$description: Light grey. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Lighter.$description: Lighter grey. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Lightest.$description: Lightest grey. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

White.$description: White. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Light underline.$description: Light coloured underline colour used for text links in Alerts messaging. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Dark underline.$description: Dark coloured underline colour used for text links in Alerts messaging. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Caution.$description: Caution colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Caution darker.$description: Caution colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Caution lightest.$description: Caution colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Caution lighter.$description: Caution colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Error darker.$description: Error colour for Status and Warning / Error alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Info darker.$description: General information colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Info lightest.$description: General information colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Info lighter.$description: General information colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Error.$description: Error colour for Status and warnings / Error alerts. This colour is Core and cannot be modified.

Error lighter.$description: Error colour for Status and warnings / Error alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Error lightest.$description: Error colour for Status and Warning / Error alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Info.$description: General information colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Success.$description: Success colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Success darker.$description: Success colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Success lightest.$description: Success colour for Status and Alerts

Success lighter.$description: Success colour for Status and Alerts. This colour is reserved only for Status/Alerts and cannot be modified.

Values.$description: Used as Values colour in code snippet blocks for QGDS. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Elements.$description: Used as Elements colour in code snippet blocks for QGDS.  This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Properties.$description: Used as Properties colour in code snippet blocks for QGDS. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Comments.$description: Used as Comments colour in code snippet blocks for QGDS. This is a core colour and cannot be modified.

Light.$description: Used as the Custo background colour when using the advanced banner in a contained layout. There is only 1 variable that is automatically applied based on the colour of the header.

Dark.$description: Used as the Custom background colour when using the advanced banner in a contained layout. There is only 1 variable that is automatically applied based on the colour of the header.
